name: Nikita Doroshenko
summary: Full-Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience looking for a full-time position; 80% backend Java development, 20% frontend React development.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
experience.description: Developing a service network for CV with microservices architecture. Responsibilities included development of several services (employer service, cv service, security service, schedule); implementing new functionality; working with MongoDB (geo search, aggregation); integrating services into the application (notification service); implementing frontend functionality (register, change password, update employee data, routes); writing and running JUnit tests; refactoring code and bug fixing.

experience.title: Java Backend Developer
experience.description: Production reporting automation: installing and maintaining databases; populating a database with new information or transferring existing data into it; creation and implementation of methods for working with data for the planning department.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Developing and implementing reports; collecting and adding data from various sources; database support (adding, deleting data). Technologies: Microsoft Excel, Visual Basic for Applications, Power BI, SQL, CSB, NAV, SAP.

education.degree: Special program for software developers' adaptation in accordance with Israel IT technologies
